long_description: The freestanding, full-featured Sierra Designs Lightning 2 Tent shelters 2 backpackers and their gear through 3 seasons with maximum comfort and minimum hassle. Hybrid double/single wall design reduces weight and provides quick setup, even in the rain. Enjoy simple, speedy and dry setup with a single hubbed shock-corded pole frame; freestanding design can be pitched anywhere. 15-in. integrated awning provides shade and moves the drip line away from the door. The Sierra Designs Lightning 2 Tent features a single door that saves weight; it's extra wide and large enough for 2 people to sit side by side. Gear closets store gear where it should be-away from the door; they can be closed or left open for additional venting.
